text: London Irish are a rugby club based in Sunbury, England who play in the Aviva Premiership. ==League position== Season League Position 2010/11 Aviva Premiership 2011/12 Aviva Premiership 2012/13 Aviva Premiership ===Former position=== Category:English rugby union teams Category:1898 establishments in England Category:Organisations based in Surrey
title: London Irish
